body:
hallo, 



Is there a way to transform/ interpolate the resulted meshes of any daylight results into isoline curves? 

Attached is a basic example for daylightfactor, but i couldn't trasnform the mesh into isolines.

Thank you,

J.
topic: Daylight analysis Mesh results to Isoline

replies.body:
Hi Nass,

The short answer is yes. Check this discussion for a similar question: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/3d-result-v...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/3d-result-visualization)

Mostapha
